Package specific

This package includes all the classes that are specific to this project

The classes from this package are very specific for the application we are doing and shouldn't be changed in order to keep the well being of the program. If new features are needed then new classes should be created that inherits classes from this package.

This simulation consists in individuals moving around a map and doing other events like death or reproduction. In the end of the simulation the path of the best individual is printed.

This package provides a simulator class, event classes like Death, Reproduction and Move, a class for the Individual as well as other specific classes for this simulation

Author:
Group 6 - 81588, 81607 and 81669 Course of Objects Oriented Language
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    A connection between points represented by the cost of the edge connecting the points, and by one of the points of the connection.
    Death
    This class extends IndividualEvent and represents the death of an Individual.
    DeathExpRandomTime
    DeathExpRandomTime extends IndividualTimeGenerator and generates time between Death events as an observation of an exponential random variable.
    GridCommands
    GridCommands extends SimulationCommands and provides an additional method to generate numbers that are necessarily associated to Individuals, such as the time between events.
    GridSimulation
    GridSimulation extends SimulationA and implements the simulate method.
    Individual
    The Individual is associated with a path of points in a map, and therefore with a correspondent cost and comfort.
    IndividualComfortComparator
    IndividualComfortComparator implements Comparator of objects of type Individual and compares Individuals according to their comfort, in descendant order.
    IndividualEvent
    This abstract class extends Event and specifies events related to the evolution of an individual and already provides some common attributes and methods.
    IndividualTimeGenerator
    IndividualTimeGenerator is an abstract implementation of the interface INumberGenerator and it associates an Individual to the generator, The method provided by the interface it's not yet implemented so classes that extend this class have to implement it.
    Map
    This class creates a map, checks validity of a path and has the info about the topology of this specific map.
    MapPoint
    Class that defines a point of the map in this specific case
    Move
    This class extends individualEvent and its simulation chooses the next point of the map to which the individual will go, and moves him by adding that point to his path.
    MoveExpRandomTime
    MoveExpRandomTime extends IndividualTimeGenerator and generates time between Move events as an observation of an exponential random variable.
    MyHandler
    This class is a handler for the SAX xml parser and retrieves the needed variables from the XML and uses them to initialize some parameters of the simulation.
    ObservationEvent
    This class extends Event and provides an observation with information about the state of the simulation.
    Point
    Point representing a location in the 2D coordinate space, with coordinates (x,y).
    Population
    This class has the parameters that rule the individuals' movements and the creation of new events.
    RandomPercentage
    RandomPercentage extends INumberGenerator and generates an uniform random between 0 and 1.
    Reproduction
    This class extends IndividualEvent and its simulation involves creating a son (new individual) based on the individual on whom the reproduction is being simulated and adds the son to the simulation's population, creating and setting his first three events (death, move, reproduction).
    ReproductionExpRandomTime
    ReproductionExpRandomTime extends IndividualTimeGenerator and generates time between Reproduction events as an observation of an exponential random variable.
